text: 1:22 Matyu 7:28-29A men sure gamima gumazamiziba bar an akam baregha dɨgavir kuram gami. An mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba mati gavgavim itir gumazimɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba. An mɨgɨrɨgɨaba Judan Arazibagh fozir gumazibar mɨgɨrɨgɨabar mɨn zuir puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumazamiziba dɨgavir kuram gami.1:22 Nɨ Judan Arazibagh fozir gumazibar mɨngarim gɨfoghsɨ, akɨnafarir kamɨn akɨrangɨn itir Akar Mɨngaribar gan.
